item.description:
With luck Meetup with Marianne and her group as they backpack through this weekend from Monadnock to Washington, NH. and stay shelter to shelter.

meet in Stoddard, NH Route 123, Center Pond Road,

pass Center Pond with 0.7 m. to the road, hike to Pitcher Mountain.

From Center Pond Road to Pitcher Mt. is 2.7 miles, to summit .4 miles.
2,253 elevation
item.name: Exploring the Greenway Trail: Pitcher Mountain
